title: College Object Validation
description: Validation schema for college objects. A college at Cal Poly labels a set of subjects.

_id.description: the unique identifier for the college object

term_id.description: the term id associated with the college

name.description: the college's friendly name (ex. 'College of Engineering', 'College of Ag, Food & Envr Sci', 'College of Science & Math')

subjects.description: an array of subject ids associated with the college

instructors.description: an array of instructor ids associated with the college

url.description: the url to the college's page (useful for end users)
